testcase.name: Provide all required details
testcase.system-out: Given User is entering data in https://www.anz.com.au/personal/home-loans/calculators-tools/much-borrow/.passed When Click "Single" in Application type under Your Details..................passed And Select Number of dependants as "0"......................................passed And Click "Home to live in" in Property you would like to buy...............passed And Enter 80000 under annual income.........................................passed And Enter 10000 under annual other income...................................passed And Enter 500 under living expenses.........................................passed And Enter 0 under current home loan repayments..............................passed And Enter 100 under other loan repayments...................................passed And Enter 0 under other commitments.........................................passed And Enter 10000 under total credit card limits..............................passed And Click Work out how much I could borrow..................................passed Then Validate the borrowing estimate outcomes...............................passed When Click Start over button................................................passed Then Validate the borrowing estimate outcomes as "0"........................passed When Enter 1 under living expenses field....................................passed And Click Work out how much I could borrow if living expenses is 1..........passed Then Validate the borrowing estimate outcome message........................passed
